companyInfo.Competitors: Deutsche Bank, Credit Suisse, Morgan Stanley

jobDescription: Are you an experienced full stack developer? Are you innovative with broad development skills that you keep current? Are you a committed team player able to work with and support others as they support you? We re looking for someone like that to help us: -create world-class solutions for geospatial processing and data analysis using agile methods -design and implement new features in Python, SQL and Big Data technologies -produce high quality technical documentation -collaborate with data scientists, geospatial analysts and other business teams -collaborate with Infrastructure and CTO teams to introduce new technology as required
